      protected int nextLineTermination(int pos)
      The (last character of) the next line termination sequence after the given character position
      java.lang.String textLine(int pos)
      Returns the text of the line containing the given position, at least through the given position, and always ending with a (perhaps added) line termination sequence.

      • Pos.Source

        public Pos.Source(java.lang.CharSequence cs,
          java.lang.Object location)
        Creates a Source from a character sequence
        Parameters:
        cs - the sequence to use as a source of characters
        location - a designator of the location of the source, used for identification only

      • Pos.Source

        public Pos.Source(SMT.Configuration smtConfig,
          java.io.File f)
           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Creates a Source from a File; for these objects, the location is the file path (a String)
        Parameters:
        smtConfig - the SMT Configuration object
        f - the File object from which to read characters
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if a problem occurred opening or reading the file

        Creates a Source from a File
        Parameters:
        smtConfig - the SMT Configuration object
        f - the InputStream object from which to read characters
        location - object describing the location of the source

        public java.lang.String textLine(int pos)
